answerText: Hard Times - For These Times[10] Another work by the author of Welcome to Hard Times is this one, which uses the characters Paul and Rochelle Isaacson to parallel the lives of the real-life Julius and Ethel Rosenberg.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 13 | 20 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: A town with this name is where the mayor, Blue, explains to his ex-prostitute wife Molly how the Bad Man from Bodie came because the town wanted Evil. [10] Name that town. This name also titles a novel by Dickens set in Coketown about the Gradgrinds and Mr. Josiah Bounderby.
